column4: hey, can i install full on login screen themes? i have a CIA thing for a friend and am unsure how to install it. I tried ubuntu tweak but that's just the logo and background.
that's all you can change in GDM
lightdm is a  bit more themable
its a package like any other, should be fine. Not themed it though as I don't think it's beneficial to theme something which is going to be onscreen for 3 seconds
